channel.title: Desert

item.title: Desert
item.dc:creator: @sportpirate sportpirate
item.description:
@sportpirate wrote:

Ok I Got Mostly Everything
I Am Almost Done With This
But It Wont Hit.

Only If I Put The } else {
This Is The Code

} if(inDesert() && PlayerHandler.drTimer == 1){ dealDamage(12); hitDiff = 12; hitUpdateRequired = true; sM("You Were Hit"); } else { sM("Your In Desert, "+PlayerHandler.drTimer+" till You Get Hit"); }

it only hits if i do this but it dose not stop hitting

} if(inDesert() && PlayerHandler.drTimer == 1){ dealDamage(12); hitDiff = 12; hitUpdateRequired = true; sM("You Were Hit"); } else { dealDamage(1); hitDiff = 1; hitUpdateRequired = true; sM("Your In Desert, "+PlayerHandler.drTimer+" till You Get Hit"); }

The Next Step Is That U Have To Drink Water

Read full topic
